channel.title: CVE Feed for Steven Ellis -- Easy2map-photos WordPress Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Steven Ellis -- Easy2map-photos WordPress Plugin

item.title: CVE-2015-4615|2024-08-06T06:18:12.219Z -- steven%20ellis -- easy2map-photos%20wordpress%20plugin
item.description: Vulnerability in Easy2map-photos WordPress Plugin v1.09 allows SQL Injection via unsanitized mapTemplateName, mapName, mapSettingsXML, parentCSSXML, photoCSSXML, mapCSSXML, mapHTML,mapID variables

item.title: CVE-2015-4617|2024-08-06T06:18:12.017Z -- steven%20ellis -- easy2map-photos%20wordpress%20plugin
item.description: Vulnerability in Easy2map-photos WordPress Plugin v1.09 MapPinImageUpload.php and MapPinIconSave.php allows path traversal when specifying file names creating files outside of the upload directory.
